name: Ocean Spray Quiz / Test | Wordplay for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters found in "OCEAN SPRAY", find a 4-letter word meaning to talk to God.
questions.explanation:
Pray.

	To pray is to talk to God or ask God for something.  A prayer is the words you say, as in "The Lord's Prayer".

questions.text: Find a 5-letter word meaning the place outside of our atmosphere where astronauts go, using only letters in "OCEAN SPRAY".
questions.explanation:
Space.

	Space is the "great ocean", as it is sometimes called, above the Earth where astronauts go.  Space has no gravity, so astronauts float around!  Space can also mean an empty area, like "there is enough space here for you to sit."

questions.text: Using only letters in "OCEAN SPRAY", find a 4-letter word for a wafer used to hold ice cream.
questions.explanation:
Cone.

	A cone is an object that is round on one end, and becomes pointy on the other end, just like an ice cream CONE.  There are also traffic cones and hats in the shape of cones.

questions.text: Find a 5-letter word meaing a kind of nut that squirrels like to eat, using only letters from "OCEAN SPRAY".
questions.explanation:
Acorn & Pecan.

	An acorn is also called an "oak nut", because they grow on oak trees.  There is also a type of squash called an "acorn squash".

questions.text: Using only letters found in "OCEAN SPRAY", find a 4-letter word for a flowing piece of clothing a superhero might wear.
questions.explanation:
Cape.

	Superheroes, like Superman, often wear capes.  They can come in many different colors.  For instance, Superman wears a red cape, Batman wears a green cape (or black in the movies), and Jedi from "Star Wars" wear brown capes!

questions.text: Using only letters in "OCEAN SPRAY", find a 3-letter word for a type of metal dish you use to cook food.
questions.explanation:
Pan.

	A pan is a metal dish, usually with a handle, used to cook food or boil water.  It can also mean to sift, as in you "pan for gold".  It is also a camera term, when the camera moves sideways, that is a "pan".

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word meaning a walking stick, or a peppermint candy shape, using only the letters in "OCEAN SPRAY".
questions.explanation:
Cane.

	A cane is a wooden (or sometimes other things like plastic or metal) stick used to help people walk if they have bad knees, feet, hips, or other injured body parts.  It can also be the hook shape of a peppermint candy, often called a "candy cane".

questions.text: Using only letters found in "OCEAN SPRAY", find a 4-letter word meaning a type of fruit.
questions.explanation:
Pear.

	A pear is a type of fruit with a big bottom and a small top.  It grows on a pear tree.  They are very sweet and juicy.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word meaning a thick cord, often used to make a lasso, using only letters from "OCEAN SPRAY".
questions.explanation:
Rope.

	A rope is a very thick rope often used to tie boats to docks or to drop anchors.  They are also often climbed in school (if your school has a rope), and they are used to catch cattle and other animals.

questions.text: Using the letters in "OCEAN SPRAY", find a 3-letter word meaning a vehicle you might find on the road.
questions.explanation:
Car.

	A car is a vehicle with four wheels.  Cars are often called "automobiles", and they come in many different shapes and sizes.
